1.Download the MAP
2.Zip or WinRAR the file
3.Go to C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\user name\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps and add the file.
4.Finish, you can play this MAP now =)
5.Have FUN

I will later add another radar .... =)
